doc_text:
Football

Tickets

We accept cash only.

Adults (18 & Over) $5

Children (17 & Under) $2

CMU Students free with CMU ID.

Student ID card from PAC or UAA opponent is free

PAC Pass is free

On-site purchasing only.

Programs - $5

Parking - The East Campus Garage, adjacent to the field, is open for visitors.

Visitor Parking information can be found toward the bottom of our CMU parking page .

**All other sporting events are free of charge except NCAA post season competition where rates are determined by the NCAA.

All athletics competitions are held on campus except softball and golf. Please see the facilities page for softball for specific venue information.

With the construction of Skibo Gymnasium, our volleyball and basketball venue is now Wiegand Gymnasium in the Cohon University Center.

Maps & Parking

Tailgate Policy

Pet Policy - pdf

Share

Facebook

Twitter

Email

Print

qa_list.question: What types of payment are accepted for purchasing football tickets?
qa_list.answer: Cash is the only acceptable form of payment.

qa_list.question: Who can attend CMU games for free with their ID card?
qa_list.answer: CMU students and those who have student ID cards from PAC or UAA opponents.
